activities: Affluent Ads, LLC operates consumer friendly websites that generate leads in the payday loan and cash advance verticals; these websites gather customer information for the purpose of matching the customer with a short term lender. Affluent Ads, LLC itself does not provide any loans or other financial products.
personaldata: Affluent Ads, LLC collects customer data covered by the Safe Harbor Framework. This data is not usually manually processed.
privacyprograms: Affluent Ads, LLC participates in the TRUSTe privacy program.
recoursemech: Affluent Ads, LLC relies on TRUSTe as its available mechanism to investigate unresolved complaints.
